MongoDBComponentResource.description: The mongodb.com/MongoDB component is a portable component which can be deployed to any Radius platform.

managed.description: Indicates if the resource is Radius-managed. If false, a Resource must be specified

resource.description: The ID of the user-managed DB with Mongo API to use for this Component

host.description: The host name of the MongoDB to which you are connecting

port.description: The port value of the MongoDB to which you are connecting

username.description: The password for this MongoDB instance

password.description: The password for this MongoDB instance

connectionString.description: The connection string used to connect to this DB
